title: Aloe Vera
description: A succulent plant species known for its healing properties, particularly for skin conditions and digestive health.
purpose: Supports skin health, digestive function, and immune system

title: Ashwagandha
description: An ancient medicinal herb used in traditional Indian Ayurvedic medicine.
purpose: Reduces stress and anxiety, improves strength and muscle mass

title: Astaxanthin
description: A powerful antioxidant carotenoid found in marine organisms and algae.
purpose: Supports skin health, eye health, and athletic performance

title: Beta Carotene
description: A plant-based pigment that the body converts into Vitamin A.
purpose: Supports eye health, immune function, and skin health

title: Bone Broth
description: A nutrient-rich stock made from simmering animal bones and connective tissue.
purpose: Supports joint health, gut health, and immune system

title: Calcium
description: An essential mineral crucial for bone health and cellular function.
purpose: Supports bone health, muscle function, and nerve signaling

title: Chamomile
description: A daisy-like plant known for its calming and anti-inflammatory properties.
purpose: Promotes relaxation, sleep quality, and digestive health

title: Chlorella
description: A nutrient-dense freshwater algae high in protein and vitamins.
purpose: Supports detoxification, immune function, and energy levels

title: Chromium
description: An essential trace mineral that helps regulate blood sugar.
purpose: Supports blood sugar regulation and metabolism

title: CoQ10
description: A naturally occurring antioxidant important for cellular energy production.
purpose: Supports heart health, energy production, and anti-aging

title: Cranberry
description: A fruit extract known for its urinary tract health benefits.
purpose: Supports urinary tract health and immune function

title: Echinacea
description: A flowering plant used traditionally for immune support.
purpose: Supports immune system function and cold/flu prevention

title: Elderberry
description: A dark purple berry known for its immune-boosting properties.
purpose: Supports immune system and respiratory health

title: Fish Oil
description: Oil derived from fatty fish, rich in omega-3 fatty acids.
purpose: Supports heart health, brain function, and reduces inflammation

title: Folic Acid
description: A B vitamin essential for cell growth and DNA synthesis.
purpose: Supports pregnancy health and red blood cell formation

title: Garlic
description: A medicinal plant known for its immune-boosting properties.
purpose: Supports immune system and heart health

title: Ginger
description: A root with powerful anti-inflammatory properties.
purpose: Supports digestive health and reduces inflammation

title: Ginseng
description: An adaptogenic root used traditionally for energy and vitality.
purpose: Supports energy levels, cognitive function, and stress response

title: Glucosamine
description: A compound found naturally in cartilage.
purpose: Supports joint health and mobility

title: Green Tea Extract
description: Concentrated extract from green tea leaves rich in antioxidants.
purpose: Supports metabolism, brain function, and antioxidant protection

title: Iron
description: An essential mineral crucial for blood production.
purpose: Supports oxygen transport and energy production

title: L-Theanine
description: An amino acid found naturally in tea leaves.
purpose: Promotes relaxation and focus without drowsiness

title: Lutein
description: A carotenoid important for eye health.
purpose: Supports eye health and vision

title: Lycopene
description: A powerful antioxidant found in red fruits and vegetables.
purpose: Supports prostate health and heart health

title: Magnesium
description: An essential mineral involved in hundreds of biochemical reactions.
purpose: Supports muscle and nerve function, energy production

title: Melatonin
description: A hormone that regulates sleep-wake cycles.
purpose: Supports sleep quality and circadian rhythm

title: Milk Thistle
description: An herb known for its liver-protective properties.
purpose: Supports liver health and detoxification

title: MSM
description: A sulfur-containing compound found in many foods.
purpose: Supports joint health and reduces inflammation

title: Potassium
description: An essential mineral for heart, muscle, and nerve function.
purpose: Supports heart health and muscle function

title: Probiotics
description: Beneficial bacteria that support gut health.
purpose: Supports digestive health and immune function

title: Rhodiola
description: An adaptogenic herb that helps the body adapt to stress.
purpose: Supports stress response and energy levels

title: Saw Palmetto
description: A palm extract used traditionally for prostate health.
purpose: Supports prostate health and hormone balance

title: Selenium
description: An essential trace mineral with antioxidant properties.
purpose: Supports thyroid function and immune system

title: Spirulina
description: A blue-green algae rich in protein and nutrients.
purpose: Supports overall nutrition and immune function

title: St. John's Wort
description: An herb traditionally used for mood support.
purpose: Supports mood and emotional well-being

title: Turmeric
description: A spice containing curcumin, known for anti-inflammatory properties.
purpose: Supports joint health and reduces inflammation

title: Valerian
description: An herb traditionally used for sleep support.
purpose: Supports sleep quality and relaxation

title: Vitamin A
description: A fat-soluble vitamin essential for vision and immune function.
purpose: Supports eye health, immune function, and skin health

title: Vitamin B7 (Biotin)
description: A B vitamin important for hair, skin, and nail health.
purpose: Supports hair, skin, and nail health

title: Vitamin B12
description: A B vitamin essential for red blood cell formation and nerve function.
purpose: Supports energy production and nervous system health

title: Vitamin C
description: An essential vitamin with powerful antioxidant properties.
purpose: Supports immune function and skin health

title: Vitamin D3
description: A fat-soluble vitamin important for bone health and immunity.
purpose: Supports bone health and immune function

title: Vitamin E
description: A fat-soluble vitamin with antioxidant properties.
purpose: Supports skin health and antioxidant protection

title: Vitamin K
description: A fat-soluble vitamin essential for blood clotting.
purpose: Supports bone health and blood clotting

title: Zinc
description: An essential mineral important for immune function and wound healing.
purpose: Supports immune function and wound healing
